trans-unit.source: A standard endpoint that is pre-configured for discovery operations over a UDP multicast binding.
trans-unit.target: Enlace do ponto final padrão pré-configurado para operações de deteção através de um UDP multicast.

trans-unit.source: This endpoint inherits from <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> and similarly has a fixed contract and supports two WS-Discovery protocol versions.
trans-unit.target: Este ponto final herda <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> da mesma forma tem um contrato fixo e suporta duas versões de protocolo WS-Discovery.

trans-unit.source: In addition, it has a fixed UDP binding and a default address as specified in the WS-Discovery specifications (WS-Discovery April 2005 or WS-Discovery V1.1).
trans-unit.target: Além disso, tem um enlace de UDP fixo e um endereço de predefinido conforme especificado nas especificações de WS-Discovery (WS-Discovery Abril de 2005 ou v 1.1 de WS-Discovery).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Two versions of the WS-Discovery protocol are currently supported: WS-Discovery April 2005 and WS-Discovery V1.1, which correspond to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Duas versões do protocolo WS-Discovery são atualmente suportadas: de 2005 de Abril de WS-Discovery e WS-Discovery v 1.1, que correspondam ao <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A>valores de enumeração.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to use.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> classe com o endereço de multicast especificado.

trans-unit.source: The multicast address.
trans-unit.target: O endereço multicast.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> classe com o endereço de multicast especificado.

trans-unit.source: The multicast address.
trans-unit.target: O endereço multicast.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> and multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"> </xref> e o endereço multicast.

trans-unit.source: Two versions of the WS-Discovery protocol are currently supported: WS-Discovery April 2005 and WS-Discovery V1.1, which correspond to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Duas versões do protocolo WS-Discovery são atualmente suportadas: de 2005 de Abril de WS-Discovery e WS-Discovery v 1.1, que correspondam ao <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A>valores de enumeração.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to use.

trans-unit.source: The multicast address for the UDP discovery endpoint.
trans-unit.target: O endereço multicast para o ponto final de deteção UDP.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> and multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"> </xref> e o endereço multicast.

trans-unit.source: Two versions of the WS-Discovery protocol are currently supported: WS-Discovery April 2005 and WS-Discovery V1.1, which correspond to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Duas versões do protocolo WS-Discovery são atualmente suportadas: de 2005 de Abril de WS-Discovery e WS-Discovery v 1.1, que correspondam ao <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A>valores de enumeração.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscovery11%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion.WSDiscoveryApril2005%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryVersion"></xref> to use.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> with the multicast address.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Uri>com o endereço multicast.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The default UDP multicast address for IPv4.
trans-unit.target: Endereço multicast UDP predefinido para IPv4.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: The default UDP multicast address for IPv6.
trans-unit.target: Endereço multicast UDP predefinido para IPv6.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the multicast address.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o endereço multicast.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint.DefaultIPv4MulticastAddress>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint.DefaultIPv4MulticastAddress>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint.DefaultIPv4MulticastAddress>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> instance that contains the multicast address.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Uri>instância que contém o endereço multicast.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings"></xref> instance associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings"> </xref> instância associada a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings> to change UDP transport settings for the UDP endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings>para alterar as definições de transporte UDP para o ponto final UDP.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpTransportSettings>

trans-unit.source: The UDP transport settings for the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: As definições de transporte UDP para o ponto final.
